contentList.content: Once per long rest you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Fly">Fly</LSTag> on yourself without using a <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>.
If you reach 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, you regain [1] instead of becoming <LSTag Tooltip="Downed">Downed</LSTag>.
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> to maintain <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag> on a spell.
When you hit a creature with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag>, you can pull the creature up to [1] towards you.
When you hit a creature with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag> it reduces the target's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> by [1].
Once per short rest, you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Invisibility">Invisibility</LSTag> on yourself without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.
Once per long rest, you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FreedomOfMovement">Freedom of Movement</LSTag> on yourself without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.
You can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_AnimateDead">Animate Dead</LSTag> with a <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock spell slot</LSTag>.
Create 5 skeletons that specialise in ranged combat.
Create 5 zombies that specialise in melee combat.

Once per short rest you can take an action to gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DARKVISION">Darkvision</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SEE_INVISIBILITY">See Invisibility</LSTag> for 10 minutes or until your concetration ends.
Gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DARKVISION">Darkvision</LSTag> and become able to see <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> creatures, and possibly reveal them to others.
Once per short rest, you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_HoldMonster">Hold Monster</LSTag> without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>.

You can use your Warlock <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">spell slots</LSTag> to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Smite_Eldritch_Container">Smite</LSTag> a target once per turn with your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PACT_BLADE">Pact Weapon</LSTag> to deal additional damage and knock the target <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> if it is Huge or smaller.
Deals an additional [1] to the target and knocks it prone if it is Huge or smaller.
Uses a <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slot</LSTag> to deal an additional [1] to the target and knocks it prone if it is Huge or smaller.

As a <LSTag Tooltip="BonusAction">Bonus Action</LSTag>, you can teleport up to [1] in straight line to an unoccupied space in front of the target cursed by your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Hex">Hex</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BestowCurse">Bestow Curse</LSTag>, or a similar Warlock curse.

As a <LSTag Tooltip="BonusAction">Bonus Action</LSTag> you can cause a target cursed by your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Hex">Hex</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BestowCurse">Bestow Curse</LSTag>, or a similar Warlock feature within [1] to explode causing Psychic damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> (minimum of 1 damage) to the cursed target and enemies within [2] of them.

As a <LSTag Tooltip="BonusAction">Bonus Action</LSTag> you can cause a target cursed by your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Hex">Hex</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BestowCurse">Bestow Curse</LSTag>, or a similar Warlock feature within [1] to explode causing Psychic <LSTag Type="Damage">[2]</LSTag> equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> (minimum of 1 damage) to the cursed target and enemies within [3] of them.

<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/>Target must be affected by <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Hex">Hex</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BestowCurse">Bestow Curse</LSTag>, or Hexblade's Curse.

Once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> you may take a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> before taking damage, until the end of your next turn you gain 10 <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag> per warlock level, gain <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerability</LSTag> to fire damage, your speed is reduced to 0, and you are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INCAPACITATED">Incapacitated</LSTag>.

In response to damage, you gain [1] times Warlock level <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag>, gain <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerability</LSTag> to fire damage, your speed is reduced to 0, and you are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INCAPACITATED">Incapacitated</LSTag>.

As a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>, you can surround yourself with a magical aura that extends [1] and looks like buzzing flies. It lasts until you're <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INCAPACITATED">Incapacitated</LSTag> or until you dismiss it as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>. The aura grants you <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Intimidation">Charisma (Intimidation)</LSTag> checks but <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on all other <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> checks. Any enemy that starts its turn in the aura takes Poison damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma Modifier</LSTag>.

An aura of buzzing flies extends [1] from you, granting you <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Intimidation">Charisma (Intimidation)</LSTag> checks and, <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on all other <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> checks. Enemies that start their turn in the aura take [2] damage.
Buzzing flies swarm and attack, take [1] damage.
Disperses the Cloak of Flies surrounding you.

Your Pact Weapon gains a bonus to its attack and damage rolls scaling with your Warlock level (+1 as standard, +2 at 7th, and +3 at 12th), unless it is a magic weapon that already has a bonus to those rolls. Additionally, the weapon you conjure can be a shortbow, longbow, hand crossbow, light crossbow, or heavy crossbow.
Bind to your main hand melee weapon. Its damage becomes magical, you cannot be forcibly disarmed, and you become <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it if you weren't already.
Bind to your main hand ranged weapon. Its damage becomes magical, you cannot be forcibly disarmed, and you become <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it if you weren't already.
Your Pact Weapon gains a +[1] bonus to its attack and damage rolls, unless it is a magic weapon that already has a bonus to those rolls.
Pact of the Blade: Hand Crossbow
Pact of the Blade: Light Crossbow
Pact of the Blade: Heavy Crossbow
A summonable Hand Crossbow granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Light Crossbow granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Heavy Crossbow granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Shortbow granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Longbow granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
Pact of the Blade: Light Hammer
Pact of the Blade: War Pick
A summonable Club granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Dagger granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Handaxe granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Javelin granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Light Hammer granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Mace granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Sickle granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Quarterstaff granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Spear granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Greatclub granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Flail granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Morningstar granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Scimitar granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Shortsword granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable War Pick granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Greataxe granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Halberd granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Maul granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
A summonable Pike granted by a warlock's patron. Its surface crackles with interdimensional energy.
Whenever you regain hit points while your familiar is within [1] of you, you regain the maximum amount.

Your familiar is infused with eldritch power. It gains <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag> equal to your Warlock Level, the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag> and, its attack save <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">DC</LSTag> (if it has one), becomes equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Warlock Spell Save DC</LSTag>. When the familiar is attacked, you can use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> to grant it <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to the damage dealt.

Your familiar is summoned with [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag>, its attack save <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">DC</LSTag> equals [2]. It can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag> and can gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to damage using your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>.

When the familiar is attacked, you can use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> to grant it <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to the damage dealt.
